SMLS3.SA.summary: Smiles Fidelidade S.A. provides loyalty programs to financial institutions, retail and entertainment customers, airline partners, and individuals. The company focuses on the development and management of the loyalty program; the sale of redemption rights of awards; and the creation and management of individual and corporate database. It also operates travel agency. The company was formerly known as Webjet ParticipaÃ§Ãµes S.A. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Barueri, Brazil. Smiles Fidelidade S.A. is a subsidiary of Gol Linhas AÃ©reas Inteligentes S.A.

VLID3.SA.summary: Valid SoluÃ§Ãµes S.A. provides security printing services for payment and mobile solutions, identity solutions, digital marketing, and digital certification worldwide. It operates through Means of Payment, Identification, and Telecom segments. The Means of Payment segment offers integrated products and solutions, such as chip and magnetic stripe cards, gift cards, check printing, invoices, and bank statements, as well as solutions in radio frequency identification, contactless cards, and mobile payments. The Identification segment provides generation of computerized systems for the administration of databases, the collection of biometric data, the printing and personalization of official identification documents, solutions for smart cities, and traceable stamps. The Telecom segment offers issuing statements and technologies for use in cell phones, and digital mobility, such as NFC, TSM, and HCE solutions for mobile service providers. It also provides anti-fraud products and services, as well as processes and technologies that hinder forgery. The company serves state governments and governmental agencies, large financial institutions, telecommunications companies, retailers, agriculture cooperatives, and self-employed professionals. The company was formerly known as Valid SoluÃ§Ãµes e ServiÃ§os de SeguranÃ§a em Meios de Pagamento e IdentificaÃ§Ã£o S.A. and changed its name to Valid SoluÃ§Ãµes S.A. in August 2018. Valid SoluÃ§Ãµes S.A. was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
